nodes.text: The Krayts was a criminal gang operating on Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. In 3643 BBY[source?] they intercepted reports of the Empire's Imperial Intelligence from officer Keeling and were about to sell them to a highest bidder, when an Imperial interrupted the sale and recovered the reports.
The Krayts appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic as enemies on Nar Shaddaa. Their name was taken from the Krayt dragon of Tatooine.
